question: Can you provide a vegan recipe for a traditional dish from Japan and generate an image of it?

steps.content: Can you provide a vegan recipe for a traditional dish from Japan and generate an image of it?
Plan: 1) Search for a vegan recipe for a traditional Japanese dish. 2) Generate an image of the dish. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for a vegan recipe for a traditional Japanese dish.
Vegan sushi recipe: 2 cups sushi rice, 3 cups water, 1/4 cup rice vinegar, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tsp salt, nori sheets, avocado, cucumber, carrots, and tofu.
Generating an image of vegan sushi.
What is the best way to prepare the tofu for this recipe?
Plan: 1) Search for the best way to prepare tofu for sushi. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the best way to prepare tofu for sushi.
To prepare tofu for sushi, press the tofu to remove excess water, then marinate in soy sauce and sesame oil before pan-frying until golden.
